content: Think of three famous people from history whose names all contain the same letter. For example, one answer could be "Abraham Lincoln, Alexander the Great, and Amelia Earhart." What three names can you come up with and what is the common letter in their names?

Certainly! Here are three famous people from history whose names all contain the letter "C":

1. Cleopatra
2. Charles Darwin
3. Christopher Columbus

The common letter in their names is "C."
